allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update participants, navigation, and add news articles

- Remove Belarus and Russia from participants list
- Reorder Organization dropdown: Supervisory, Steering, Organizing, Scientific
- Add IChO 2025 conclusion news with ceremony images
- Add Catalyzer publication announcement
- Add Huawei logo and news images

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update Samarkand news with new content and images

- Move Samarkand news to last position \(oldest\)
- Update content with new text and hashtags
- Add sam.jpg through sam4.jpg gallery images

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Reorder news items according to specified order

Adjusted published_at dates to achieve correct sort order:
- Position 3: Site Visit to Accommodation
- Position 4: CaEX Center
- Position 5: Podcast
- Position 6: Another Key Preparation Stage
- Position 7: Preparations are progressing
- Position 8: Opening Ceremony
- Position 9: Laboratory procedures
- Position 10: Opening Ceremony Committees
- Positions 11-14: unchanged \(Full Swing, Venues, Scientific, Samarkand\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
